title: Trefethen Tasting
description:
Join us on Tuesday, August 6, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting with Trefethen Family Vineyards, one of Napa’s most respected estate wineries. Experience their elegant, estate-grown wines across red, white, and aromatic styles.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Trefethen Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Dark and structured with plum, black cherry, cocoa, and savory herbs.

• Trefethen Merlot 2022 – Silky and refined with red cherry, plum, lavender, and sweet spice.

• Trefethen Estate Chardonnay 2022 – Crisp and fresh with green apple, stone fruit, citrus, and ginger.

• Trefethen Dry Riesling 2023 – Lively and floral with lime zest, guava, jasmine, and Granny Smith apple.

Explore the range of one of Napa Valley’s pioneering family estates—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
